scripts.release:preflight: npm run check && npm run test && npm run pack:dry-run
scripts.release:tag: TAG=v$(node -p "JSON.parse(require('node:fs').readFileSync('package.json','utf8')).version"); git rev-parse "$TAG" >/dev/null 2>&1 || git tag -a "$TAG" -m "$TAG"; git push origin "$TAG"
scripts.release:gh: npm run release:tag && gh release create v$(node -p "JSON.parse(require('node:fs').readFileSync('package.json','utf8')).version") --verify-tag --generate-notes
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:preflight && npm version patch && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:preflight && npm version minor && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run release:preflight && npm version major && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch:with-release: npm run release:patch && npm run release:gh
scripts.release:minor:with-release: npm run release:minor && npm run release:gh
scripts.release:major:with-release: npm run release:major && npm run release:gh
